ch.ethz.bhepp.ode

Class BufferOdeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.bhepp.ode.BufferOdeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ode

    public class BufferOdeAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Ode
    This class takes an Ode and provides an equivalent Ode implementation that is backed by buffers suitable for solvers that make use of JNI (by using direct buffers).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferOdeAdapter(Ode ode, java.nio.DoubleBuffer xBuffer, java.nio.DoubleBuffer xDotBuffer)
      Instantiates a new direct buffer adapter for an Ode.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void computeVectorField(double t)
      Compute the vector field based on the time t and the state in the state buffer and store it in the vector field buffer.
      void computeVectorField(double t, double[] x, double[] xDot)
      Compute the vector field of the ODE (the time derivative).
      int getDimensionOfVectorField()
      Gets the dimension of the vector field.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferOdeAdapter

        public BufferOdeAdapter(Ode ode,
                java.nio.DoubleBuffer xBuffer,
                java.nio.DoubleBuffer xDotBuffer)
        Instantiates a new direct buffer adapter for an Ode.
        Parameters:
        ode - the Ode
        xBuffer - the buffer for the state
        xDotBuffer - the buffer for the vector field (will be modified by later calls)

        Parameters:
